meanings.definition: A chair that can be converted into a bed.
meanings.sent1: I love relaxing on my bedchair in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The bedchair in the guest room is very comfortable for visitors.
meanings.sent3: When my cat discovered the bedchair, she thought it was a giant scratching post!
meanings.sent4: The bedchair became my sanctuary during the long winter nights.
meanings.sent5: The bedchair's versatility makes it a must-have for small apartments.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture that serves as both a bed and a chair.
meanings.sent1: The bedchair in the studio apartment saved a lot of space.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed reading her favorite book on the cozy bedchair.
meanings.sent3: The bedchair at the office was a hit during nap time.
meanings.sent4: The bedchair's design cleverly combines comfort and functionality.
meanings.sent5: The bedchair's dual purpose impressed all the guests.
